nodes.bodyText: The SystemTable defaults to routing on a single node, so you need to add an override.
This custom routing behavior needs to be preserved.

I think we should extend the SystemTable getRouting method and add the routingProvider argument.
The routingProvider is initialized once per plan/query with the same seed, so that we have a stable routing result within one query.
May not matter much for system tables, but I think otherwise the difference in behavior could be confusing.
Sounds good, i will do a separate pr for this.
I think it should be part of this PR, as otherwise this PR introduces a behavior change and is no longer just a internal refactoring.

I'm wondering if we should remove this overload and force all users of SystemTable to use the other variant.
By keeping this, we have another indirection, due to the (node, routingProvider) -> getRouting.apply(node).
I am also not a big fan of overloading in general, i would say let's remove the Function<DiscoveryNodes, Routing> variant.
